Who We Are

About Fikanova

Bridging human creativity with artificial intelligence

Our Mission

Fikanova is a software development and digital marketing agency based in Nairobi, Kenya. We specialize in building AI-enhanced solutions that help businesses streamline operations, reach more customers, and scale effectively.

What We Do

Development

Web, mobile, and custom software

Marketing

SEO, social media, content

AI & Tech

Chatbots, automation, consulting

Our Values

  • Innovation — We embrace new technologies to solve problems
  • Quality — We deliver excellence in every project
  • Partnership — We grow together with our clients
